definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: With everything she needed bought, Grace took a taxi home.
sentences.chinese: 所需求的都买好后，格雷斯打的回家了。

sentences.english: They have bought their air tickets already.
sentences.chinese: 她们已经买好了飞机票。

sentences.english: and I can get tickets for you and whoever else is coming with you.
sentences.chinese: 我能为你和跟你一起来的朋友买好票。

sentences.english: After everything she needed was bought, Grace took a taxi home.
sentences.chinese: 所需要的都买好后，格雷斯打的回家了。

sentences.english: B. O/K. I will contact you with our Flight details.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我买好机票会通知你一切详情。

sentences.english: They bolted down the gangway and took their tickets.
sentences.chinese: 他们跑下阶梯，买好了票。

sentences.english: We ordered the blood for you. The kit's downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 血已经给你买好了，输血包也楼下。

sentences.english: Now she could go, whatever was the need for buying flowers, taken care of.
sentences.chinese: 不管为什么要买花，花已经买好了，现在她可以走了。

sentences.english: Go ahead and shop for good clothes I am not stopping you.
sentences.chinese: 你要去买好衣服，我是不会拦着你的。

sentences.english: She was busy with checking in luggage and buying tickets for us.
sentences.chinese: 她忙前忙后地帮我们发运行李，买好了车票。

sentences.english: We buy a plane ticket and the flight is delayed.
sentences.chinese: 我们买好了飞机票，而航班却被推迟了。

definition: to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
to buy tickets/(Tw) to buy votes (in an election)
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
to go back to one's roots/to return to one's native place/by ext. to join one's ancestors (i.e. to die)
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
